data.text: @msabouri @cynthiagibas @justthefacts85 Hi, you do not understand what a RCT is. It does not make you a bad person, just take 10 minutes reading about it please. Would love to talk to you about something else in the future.

@ichudov @cynthiagibas @justthefacts85 The ultimate goal of any study is to minimize the impact of confounders between your test and control groups.

Testing everybody (or everybody who consents) in a randomly selected set of schools produces test and control groups less likely to be skewed by major confounders.
